title: Wild Growth Hair Care System
description: Both Wild Growth Hair Oil and Wild Growth Light Oil Moisturizer are made from plant derived oils, vitamins and minerals. There are no petroleum by-products, and no animal by products and there are no synthetic colors, fragrances or preservatives.
